tuv.seg: A man who is happy with himself is full of love, flowing.
Clovek ki je srecen sam z seboj je poln ljubezni, radosti.
A man who loves his aloneness is capable of love, and a man who feels loneliness is incapable of love.
Clovek ki ljubi svojo samoto je sposoben ljubezni, clovek ki cuti osamljenost ni sposoben ljubezni.
A person becomes dreamy, one starts substituting.
Clovek postane zasanjan, zacne nadomescati.
A thesis presented for the degree of<br0>
Predstavljeno bla bla bla...<br0>
Aloneness is the presence of oneself.
Samota pomeni prisotnost samega sebe.
Aloneness is very positive.
Samota je zelo pozitivna.
And if a person is deprived for twenty-one days he will never come back sane.
In ce cloveku odvzames cutila za 21 dni bo postal nor.
And the way is: you will have to suffer loneliness first.
In pot je; da bos mogel trpeti osamljenost pred tem.
And then you go on and on, and you go far away from the fact.
And when you can give, much love comes towards you.
Ko lahko dajes drugim, veliko ljubezni dobis nazaj.
And when you continuously dream, those dreams look very very real.
In ko neprestalno sanjaris, ta sanjarjenja zgledajo zelo zelo resnicne.
And you have learnt how to love your indefinable, ineffable reality.
Takrat si se naucil, kako ljubiti svojo nedefinirano, nedolocljivo realnost.
Author Name
Ime avtorja
Because both aspects are always together.
Ker so se tako nasprotne reci zmeraj tesno povezane skupaj. Dan ne obstaja brez noci kakor tudi osamljenost ne obstaja brez samote.
Because he is capable of being with himself he becomes capable of being with others.
Ker je sposoben biti sam s seboj je sposoben biti z drugimi.
Because this is a trick of the mind.
To je trik uma.
Because you cannot be alone.
Ker nisi zmozen biti sam s sabo.
Blissfulness is possible only in total, unconditional freedom.
Ekstaza srece je mogoca samo v popolni, brezpogojni svobodi.
But if you allow and fall into the abyss, soon you will realize the abyss has disappeared, and with the abyss all the illusory attachments have disappeared.
Toda ce si pustis pasti v to praznino, slej kot prej spoznas da je praznine ni vec, in z praznino je odsla tudi navezanost do drugih.
But remember, the master says, <u0>{I am here alone with myself.} When you are alone you are not alone, you are simply lonely - and there is a tremendous difference between loneliness and aloneness.
Toda ne pozabi, mojster pravi, <u0>{Jaz sedim sam s seboj.} Ko si sam s seboj nisi v samoti, si samo osamljen - in tu je ogromna razlika med osamljenostjo in samoto.
But why does the mind start daydreaming?
Zakaj um zacne sanjariti?
Come back home.
Cas je da prides domov.
Country<br0>
Drzava<br0>
Date
Datum
Death only separates you from others.
Smrt te odvzame samo od drugih.
Death seems so frightening because it will snatch you away from others - the wife will not be any more with the husband, the mother will not be any more with the children.
Smrt se slisi strasljiva ker te odvzame od ljudi ki jih imas rad in oni tebe - zena ne bo vec z mozem, mati ne bo vec z otroci.
Deep down there is an abyss... undefinable.
Globoko v sebi cutis nicnost... nedolocljivost.
Department Name<br0>
Oddelek<br0>
Depending on others is depending - it is a bondage, it is a dependence, and one can never feel really blissful.
Zanasati na drugega je odvisnost - suzenstvo, zmeraj si odvisen od nekoga, nikoli ne moras resnicno cutiti ekstaze.
Doctor of Philosophy
Doktor
Even with yourself you are not capable of being in deep love, in delight - how can you be with others?
Ce nisi sposoben biti, v globoki ljubezni sam z saboj, v radosti - kako si lahko z drugimi?
Fantasy is a substitute.
Fantazija je substitucija.
Great uncomfort, inconvenience arises, because we don't know who we are.
Zacutis nelagodje, paniko, saj v resnici ne ves kdo si.
He does not need anybody's love, hence he can give.
Ne potrebuje ljubezni od nikogar, a se vedno jo lahko daje drugemu.
He knows that he himself is enough unto himself.
Ve da je on, sam sebi popolnoma dovolj, to je vse kar v resnici rabi.
He says, <u0>{This is the greatest miracle.
On pravi, <u0>{To je najvecji cloveski cudez.
He will become insane, because his imagination will take complete possession of him.
Postal bo nor, ker je njegova domislija prevzela kontrolo nad njem.
He will love that tremendous emptiness, this pure infinity.
Ljubil bo to neskoncno nicelnost, to cisto neskoncnost.
He will not miss anything because he has arrived home.
Nicesar ne bo pogresal ker je prisel domov.
How to define yourself?
Ali v resnici ves kdo si ti ko ni nobenega zraven?

I sit here alone with myself.} To be with oneself and to be happily with oneself, blissfully with oneself, and not to move into fantasies... then suddenly one is at home, one is entering into one's own abyss.
Jaz sedim tukaj sam s seboj.} Biti sam s sabo v sreci, ekstazi, in hkrati ne zaceti z fantaziranjem... kar naenkrat si prisel domov, zapolnil si v svojo lastno praznino z svojo prisotnostjo.

If a person is deprived of all impressions - his eyes are closed, he is put in a box, his ears are closed, his whole body is encased in foam rubber so the touch is monotonous, the darkness in the eyes is monotonous, the soundlessness is monotonous, everything monotonous - within two, three hours he starts dreaming - such fantastic dreams, and so real... realer than real.

Ce so cloveku odvzeti vsa cutna zaznavanja - njegove oci zaprte, njegova usesa zatesnjena, celotno telo zavito v peno da je dotik monoton, tema v oceh monotona, brezzvocje monotono, vse monotono - v dveh, treh urah clovek zacne sanjariti - tako fantasticne sanje, in tako resnicne... resnicne od realnosti.
If suddenly by some magic the whole world disappears and this zen master is left alone, he will be as happy as ever, he will not miss anything.
Ce se kar naenkrat zaradi neke carovnije vse izbrise iz vesolja da ostane samo nicelnost in zen mojster, se zaradi tega dogodka njegova sreca ne bo nic spremenila, nicesar ne bo pogresal.
If the whole world disappears this zen master will not miss anything.
Ce vse izgine, zen mojster ne bo pogresal nicesar.
If there is nothing new outside, one creates one's own imaginative world and starts looking into it.
Ce ni nicesar v zunanjem svetu, ustvaris svoj notranji fantazijski svet v katerega zacnes gledati.
If you are happy because a woman loves you, you will become unhappy if she does not love you.
Ce si srecen ker te partner ljubi, bos postal nesrecen ce te kar naenkrat ne bo vec marala.
If you are happy for any reason whatsoever, then any day the reason is not there, you will become unhappy.
Ce si srecen zaradi katerega koli razloga, ko tega razloga ni vec, bos postal nesrecen.
If you are not capable of being with yourself, how can you be capable of being with others?
Ce nisi sposoben biti sam z seboj, kako si lahko sposoben biti z drugimi?
If you go deeper into it one moment is bound to come when suddenly you will start feeling the positive aspect of it.
Ce bos sel globje v osamljenost bo moment zagotovo prisel ko bos zacel cutiti pozitivene vidike osamljenosti.
If you have been conditioned as a Christian, sooner or later in a himalayan cave you will encounter Jesus, and this will be pure imagination.
Ce si bil ucen v Kristjanstvu, slej kot prej v himalajski jami bos spoznal Jezusa, in to bo cisto sanjarjenje.
If you start feeling lonely then there is something missing in your being, then you have not been able yet to understand who you are.
Ce bom zacutil osamljenost potem nekaj manjka tvojemu obstoju, potem se nisi sposoben razumeti kdo si v resnici.
If you start looking for meaning you will miss the meaning of it.
In fact only he is capable of being with others.
V resnici je samo on sposoben ziveti v druzbi drugih.
Introduction
Uvod introduction
It appears like emptiness when you enter, but once you have entered it is the very fullness of being, the fulfillment, the blossoming, the climax, the crescendo.
Ko vstopas imas obcutek da vstopas v praznino, vendar ko enkrat vstopis zacutis polnost kaj pomeni BITI, izpolnjenost, razscvetenje, vrhunec.
It cannot separate you from yourself; there is no way to separate you from yourself.
Ne mora te pa odvzeti od samega sebe; to ni mogoce.
It creates fear.
Zacutis strah.
It is a presence, overflowing presence.
Samota je prisotnost, zapolnjena, kipeca, prisotnost.
It is a response, a natural response.
To je naravni odziv drugega.
It is a simple statement.
It is difficult, meditation is difficult.
Seveda ti bo tezsko, meditacija je tezska.
It is immensely beautiful to be alone.
Zelo lepo je biti sam z seboj.
It is like a rose flower - a simple statement.
It is not a parable, it is simply a fact.
It is not emptiness.
Ni praznina.
It only appears to be emptiness because you have lived with others and suddenly you miss the others; that's why you interpret it as empty.
Samo zgleda kot praznina ker vse zivljenje zivimo z drugimi in jih seveda pogresas; zato to interpretiras kot praznino.
It transforms - it is a negative aspect of the same phenomenon.
Transformira se - ker je nasprotni, obratni vidik enakega pojava.
It would have been good if the other was there, but the other is not.
Ko si osamljen bi bilo lepo ce bi bil zraven se nekdo drug, vendar ni nobenega.
Its beauty is the ultimate beauty, its grandeur is the ultimate grandeur, its power is the ultimate power.
Njegova lepota je ultimativna lepota, njegova velicina je najvecja velicina, njena moc je ultimativna.
Just sit alone sometimes.
Probaj sedeti sam z seboj obcasno.
Knowing it well - that this will be taken away - he surrenders it.
Dobro ve da slej kot prej mu bo vse odvzeto - to preda sam od sebe.
Loneliness is a negative state.
Osamljenost je negativno stanje.
Loneliness is absence of the other.
Osamljenost pomeni pomanjkanje drugega.
Loneliness is the negative aspect of aloneness.
Osamljenost je nasprotni vidik samote.
Look directly into it.
Mantra meditation, is not meditation at all, because meditation simply means to be alone, not doing anything - not even chanting a mantra.
Meditacija z mantranjem, sploh ni meditacija, ker meditacija enostavno pomeni biti sam brez aktivnosti - niti mantrati mantro.
Many experiments have been done in the West on sense deprivation.
Veliko eksperimentov je bilo narejeno na odvzemu cutnega zaznavanja.
Moksha means absolute freedom.
Moksha pomeni absolutna svoboda.
Nobody can take it away, not even death.
Nihce ti je ne mora vzeti, niti smrt.
Nobody wants to be alone.
Nihce ne zeli ostati sam.
Nothing to distract the mind outside, the mind starts creating its own dreams inside.
Ce um nima nicesar kar bi ga lahko zamotilo, um sam ustvari svoj notraji svet sanj.
Nothing to pay attention to - just the same monotonous expanse of sands and sands; nothing to distract, nothing new - monotonous, boring.
Tam ni nicesar na cemer bi se um lahko fokusiral - tam je samo monotona prostranost peska; brez distrakcij, nic novega - monotonicno, dolgocasje.
Now this sound of <u2>{Ram} continuously repeated will become their companion.
Ta zvok <u2>{Ohm} neprestalno ponovljen bo postal njihov druzabnik.
Once you have learned how to be with yourself then death is meaningless, then death does not exist.
Ko se naucis biti z samim seboj je smrt nesmiselna, nato smrt ne obstaja vec.
One feels always a need for the other.
Zmeraj cutis potrebo po druzbi.
Others are far away.
Drugi lahko samo ugibajo kaj so tvoje resnice potrebe.
Others are not there, only you are there - but you cannot see yourself right now, you simply miss the others.
Drugih ni tam, samo ti si - toda ne vidis samega sebe, ker pogresas druge.
People come to me and they ask, <u0>{Yes, we are ready to sit, but give us a mantra so that we can chant a mantra.} What are they asking?
Ljudje pridejo do mene in vprasajo, <u0>{Da, smo pripravljeni sedeti, toda daj nam mantro da lahko mantramo.} Kaj me vprasajo?
People do a thousand and one things just not to be left alone.
Delas tisoc in eno stvar samo da ne bi ostal v osamljenosti.
Remember, death only separates you from others, it never separates you from yourself.
Zapomni si da te smrt samo odvzame od drugih, nikoli ti ne odvzame samega sebe.
Remember, when your happiness depends on others, your unhappiness also will depend on others.
Ne pozabi ce je tvoja sreca odvisna od drugih stvari, bo tvoja nesreca tudi odvisna od drugih stvari.
So be lonely, suffer loneliness.
Torej bodi osamljen, trpi osamljenost.
So either it needs somebody in reality, or, if in reality somebody is not there, then it creates fantasy.
Ali potrebuje nekoga v realnosti, ce v realnosti ni nobenega tam, um ustvari fantazije.
Somebody asked a zen master, <u0>{What is the greatest miracle in the world?} The master replied, <u1>{I am sitting here alone with me.}
Nekdo je vprašal zen mojstra, <u0>{Kaj je največji čudež?} Mojster je odgovoril, <u1>{Jaz sedim tukaj sam s seboj.}

Somehow you want to merge with a crowd where you can feel at ease, that you are not alone, there are so many people like you - so many Mohammedans like you, so many Hindus like you, so many Christians, millions of them... you are not alone.
Zelis se izgubiti v druzbi kjer se lahko sprostis ter pozabis na svojo osamljenost, toliko podobnih ljudi tebi - enako mislecih ljudi, na miljone... nisi vec osamljen.
Suffer it, go through it.
Trpel bos, se vedno vstrajno hodi.
THE GREATEST MIRACLE
JAZ SEDIM TUKAJ SAM S SEBOJ

That means now you don't belong to any church, you don't belong to any organization, you don't belong to any theology, you don't belong to any ideology - socialist, communist, fascist, hindu, christian, jain, buddhist - you don't belong, you simply are.

To pomeni da ne pripadas nobeni cerkvi, ne pripadas nobeni organizaciji, ne pripadas nobeni teologiji, ne pripadas nobeni ideologiji, ne pripadas nobenemu cloveku - ne pripadas nicemur, preposto obstajas brez razloga, samo si.
That which death can take away from you, you have surrendered on your own accord.
To kar smrt odvzame, to ji ti predas veliko prej preden se zgodi.
That which death is going to do, a meditator does on his own accord, voluntarily.
To kar smrt naredi, yogi v meditaciji naredi sam od sebe, prostovoljno.
That's what happens to people who go to the Himalayas and sit in caves to meditate.
To se zgodi z ljudmi ki grejo v Himalajske jame meditirat.
That's what meditation is - to surrender the non-essential, that which death can take away from you.
Tocno to meditacija naredi - v njej predas neesencijalne stvari katere smrt lahko ti odvzame.
That's what meditation is all about - just sitting alone, doing nothing, Just try.
To je bistvo meditacije - samo sedeti sam z seboj, delati nicesar, probaj jo kdaj izskusiti.
That's what the mind has always been doing.
To um zmeraj dela.

That's why if a person goes to the desert, to the Arabian Desert, to the Sahara, and sits there, he will start imagining, visions will start coming to him, because a desert is a very monotonous thing.
Enako se zgodi z osebo ki gre v puscavo, sedeti v saharo, zacel bo sanjariti, imel bo videnja, ker puscava je zelo monotona.
That's why in the East we call it moksha.
Na vzshodu temu pravijo moksha.
That's why you dream in the night - because in sleep you are alone; the world disappears.
To je razlog zakaj sanjas ponoci - ponoci v sanjah si sam; svet izgine.
The first lesson of love is to learn how to be alone.
Prva lekcija ljubezni je da se naucis ziveti v samoti.
The greatest fear in the world is to be left alone.
Najbolj se bojis osamljenosti.
The husband was talking so beautifully and suddenly he has lost his temper.
Partner ti je vceraj govoril o ljubezni danes pa je izgubil potrpljenje.
The meaning is there, obvious; there is no need to search for it.
The mind cannot live alone.
Um ne mora ziveti sam z sabo.
The moment you start searching for meaning about such simple facts, you weave philosophies, you create metaphysics.
The other becomes a mirror and we can see our faces in it.
Drugi postanejo tvoje ogledalo v katerem lahko vidis svoj obraz.
The other helps you to hang out, the other helps you to remain out.
Prisotnost drugega ti pomaga to pozabiti, drugi ti pomaga da tega vec ne cutis.
The other somehow makes us complete, otherwise we are incomplete.
Drugi nekako izspopolnijo tvoj obstoj, drugace pa samemu sebi nisi nikoli dovolj.
The scientific explanation is that the mind cannot live alone with itself.
Znanstvena razlaga je da um ne mora ziveti sam z sabo.
The woman was smiling just now, and then she has become angry.
Partner se ti je prejsnji trenutek smejal, zdaj pa je postal zagrenjen in jezen.
The zen master is right.
Zen mojster je imel prav.
The zen master said, <u0>{I am sitting here alone with myself.} This is the greatest miracle.
Then death cannot take anything away from you.
Smrt ti ne mora odvzeti nicesar vec od tebe.
Then go deeper into this loneliness until you come to a layer when suddenly loneliness transforms itself into aloneness.
Pojdi globje v osamljenost dokler ne prides do tocke kjer se osamljenost transformira v samoto.
Then happens the greatest miracle - that you are simply happy for no reason at all.
Nato se zgodi najvecji cloveski cudez - srecen si brez razloga.

Then they can imagine anything - gods and goddesses and apsaras and angels and Krishna playing on his flute, and Rama standing with his bow, and Jesus - and whatsoever your imagination, whatsoever your conditioning.
Z umom ustvarijo nato karkoli - bogove in boginje, duhove, angele, Krishno kako igra na flavto, Jezusa - in karkoli kar ustreza domisliji uma, kar koli je tvoja glavna ideologija.
There is a tremendous need for the other because something is lacking within ourselves.
Velikanska je tvoja potreba po druzbi, nekaj manjka tvoji exsistenci.
There is an abyss... emptiness.
Tam ni nicesar... praznina.
There is no need to search for any meaning.
There is nothing to be compared with it.
Nicesar se ne mora primerjati z tem.
Thesis Subtitle
Podnapis
Thesis Title
Naslov
They are missing the whole point.
Bistvo meditacije so zaradi tega izgubili.
They are saying that they don't want to be alone, they don't want to face their loneliness.
Pravijo da nocejo biti sami s seboj, nocejo se soociti z svojo osamljenostjo.
They start imagining.
Zacnejo sanjariti.
They will chant a mantra - the mantra will become their companion.
Oni bodo mantrali mantro - mantra bo postala njihova druzba.
They will say, <u1>{Ram, Ram, Ram} - now they are not alone.
Mantrali bodo, <u1>{Ohm, Ohm, Ohm} - in ne bodo vec osamljeni.
This does not mean that a man who has become enlightened and has come home does not live with others.
To ne pomeni da moz ki je postal razsvetljen in ki je prisel domov ne zna ziveti z drugimi.
This suffering of loneliness is just paying for it.
To trpljenje bo tvoja osamljenost s katero bos placal.
This whole illusion that exists around you is because you have not learned one basic thing - of being alone.
Ta velikanka sanjska iluzija obstaja samo zaradi tega ker se nisi naucil temelne stvari - zivljenja v samoti.
To be alone is really the greatest miracle.
Ostati sam z sabo je resnicno najvecji cloveski cudez.
To be alone is the greatest achievement.
To be with oneself is moksha because now you don't depend.
Biti pravilno s samim seboj je moksha ker zdaj nisi vec odvisen od kogarkoli in cesarkoli.
Try it, to have the feel.
Probaj jo kdaj obcutiti.
University Name<br0>
Univerziteta<br0>
We don't know with whom we are.
Ne ves skom si.
We have holes in our being; we stuff those holes with the presence of the other.
V sebi imas existencne luknje; te luknje polnes z prisotnostjo drugih.
We know the name, we know the form, we know the man or the woman - Hindu, Christian, Indian, American - there are some ways to define the other.
Poznas ime, poznas obliko, poznas moskega ali zensko - Kristjan, Musliman, Slovenec.
What is the meaning of this parable?
When there is nobody you are simply left with your emptiness.
Ko ni nobenega vec ob tebi si spet prepuscen svoji praznosti.
When we are alone we are in very strange company, very embarrassing company.
Ko si v samoti si v zelo cudni druzbi, neprijetni, mucni druzbi.
When you are in need how can you give?
Ko si v pomanjkanju kako lahko dajes kar koli drugim?
When you are lonely you are thinking of the other, you are missing the other.
Ko si osamljen mislis na drugega, pogresas prisotnost drugega.
When you sit alone, have you watched how many fantasies reveal themselves to you?... endless fantasies, daydreams.
Ko sedis v samoti, ali si kdaj videl koliko fantazij zacnes videvati?... neskoncne fantazije, sanje.
Whenever you are alone, you start daydreaming.
Kadarkoli si sam, zacnes sanjariti.
Whenever you don't have anything to do and you feel bored, immediately you escape into daydreams.
Ko nimas nicesar za delati in zacutis dolgocasje, takoj se zacenjas zatekati v sanjarjenje.
Why are dreams needed?
Zakaj so sanje sploh potrebne?
With the other, things are clear, defined.
V druzbi, so tvoje lastnosti jasno definirane.
Without the other we are suddenly thrown to ourselves.
Brez drugih si kar naenkrat prepuscen samemu sebi.
Without the other we don't know who we are, we lose our identity.
Brez drugih neves kdo si, izgubis svojo identiteto.
Yes, it is the greatest miracle in the world.
Da, to je resnicno najvecji cloveski cudez.
You are a beggar.
Ko si v pomanjkanju si berac.
You are at the closest quarters.
Samo ti ves kaj v resnici TI potrebujes.
You are feeling that it would have been better if the other was there - your friend, your wife, your mother, your beloved, your husband.
V osamljenosti cutis da bi bilo bolje ce bi zraven tebe bil se nekdo drug - tvoj prijatelj, tvoja druzina, ljubljena oseba.
You are so full of presence that you can fill the whole universe with your presence and there is no need for anybody.
Tako si poln prisotnosti da lahko z njo napolnis celotno vesolje, in tam ni potrebe po nobeni druzbi.
You become deathless.
Postanes brez smrten.
You become frightened.
Postanes na smrt prestrasen.
You become part of the crowd, you become part of a church, you become part of an organization.
Postanes del druzbe, postanes clan cerkve, postanes del organizacije.
You can never be certain.
Nikoli ne moras biti popolnoma siguren o nicemer.
You don't have any loopholes, you don't have any holes, you are not missing anything, you don't have any flaws - you are simply happy by being yourself.
Nimas vec nobenih miselnih vozlov, nimas vec nobenih eksistencnih lukenj, ne pogresas vec nicesar, nimas vec manjkajocih delov - srecen si da lahko preprosto obstajas.
You don't need anything, your bliss is unconditional.
Ne potrebujes nicesar vec, tvoja sreca je brez pogojev.
You have become too habitual; the idea of the other has become very ingrained, it has become a mechanical habit, so when you miss it you feel you are empty, lonely, falling in an abyss.

Postal si prevec ustaljen v rutino; ideja drugega se ti je zakoreninila v lastne navade, postala je mehanicna navada, in ko pogresas drugega imas obcutek da si prazen, osamljen, zacnes padati v praznino.
You have come to know how to be with yourself.
Spoznal si kako biti sam sebi najboljsi prijatelj.
You have to pay for the bliss that is going to be yours - you have to pay for it.
Placal bos za ekstazo ki bo nekoc tvoja - moral jo bos poplacati.
You imitate your neighbours so you are just like them and you are not left alone.
Imitiras bliznje ljudi da si podoben njim in nisi vec osamljen.
You lose your individuality, you lose your uniqueness, you just become imitators, because if you are not imitators you will be left alone.
Izgubis svojo individualnost, izgubis svojo unikatnost, postanes imitator, ker ce nisi imitator ostanes v osamljenosti.
You start merging into that.
Zacnes se zlivati v to nedolocljivo nicnost.
You will be tremendously benefited.
Veliko bos pridobil! Pridi domov.
You will never be certain whether you are happy or unhappy, because each moment you will see the ground underneath can disappear - any moment it can disappear.
Nikoli ne bos siguren ali si srecen ali nesrecen, ker v vsakem momentu se stvari lahko spremenijo, vsak trenutek ti lahko tla pod nogami izginejo - vsak trenutek lahko vse izgine.
Your happiness simply is your own, you don't borrow it from anybody.
Tvoja sreca je samo tvoja, ne sposojaj si je od nobenega in nicesar.
Your happiness will always be on the rocks, you will always remain in stormy weather.
Tvoja sreca bo zmeraj odvisna od zunanjih dejavnikov, zmeraj bos berac svoje srece.
Your husband is no more there, your children are no more there, your wife is no more there, you are simply alone - and you have become incapable of aloneness.
Tvoje druzine ni vec tam, tvojih prijateljev ni, sam si - in postal si nezmozen samote.
Your mind simply substitutes another world of dreams; dreams, cycles of dreams the whole night.
Tvoj um enostavno zamenja realnost z sanjskim svetom; sanje, cikli sanj celo noc.
Your needs for the other have disappeared.
Potrebe po druzbi drugega so izginile.
you want to rush towards the other.
Hitis v druzbo drugega.
